title: BadDrawable X error during Gazebo startup

content.raw:
Occasionally on startup Gazebo server will crash with the following X error. After starting Gazebo many different times with the same startup parameters I've found that it happens on approximately 1% of the time when running Gazebo.

I've seen this happen with both CPU and GPU rendering.

```
X Error of failed request:  BadDrawable (invalid Pixmap or Window parameter)
  Major opcode of failed request:  55 (X_CreateGC)
  Resource id in failed request:  <>
  Serial number of failed request:  25
  Current serial number in output stream:  27
```
